1.0.name: wordpress/linux-promotional-plugin
1.0.description:
The Linux Promotional Plugin is a plugin that shows a informative message alerting Windows and Mac users about the advantages of Linux, and providing links to choosen distros.

You can choose from 2 types of promotions:

  • TOP, a discreet top bar
  • FULL, a fullscreen promotional message

See the new Linux Promotional Plugin for further information.

All suggestions for improvements are welcome!
